author: pacedesign

comments.content: It looks to be [Firehouse](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826064328/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/firehouse.php) by Tom Kennedy of Letterhead Fonts.

Yes, that's it. I'm familiar with LHF, but I don't know why I didn't recognize it. Thank you Mike!

John
